AUTHOR: ZeLarpMaster#0818, BJPickles#6955
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing the role reactions cog. Hope you enjoy!
To get a message's ID you can right click a message and click Copy ID with the developer mode enabled.
To enable the developer go to Settings > Appearance > Advanced > Developer Mode
NAME: ReactRole
SHORT: Associate reactions on messages with a role
DESCRIPTION:
Associate reactions on messages with a role to give users a role when clicking the reaction or removing the role when they click again.
Important note: this requires the ClientModification cog (can be found on the repo) to work properly.
